onChange.script:
import traceback
	try:
		if currentValue.value:
			#system.perspective.print('Add Service')
			instances = self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexRepeater").props.instances
			#system.perspective.print(len(instances))
			null = None
		
			object = {
		 	 "instanceStyle": {
		    	"classes": ""
		  		},
		  		"instancePosition": {},
		  		"participant_id":self.custom.edit_data.participant_id,
		  		"employee_id": null,
		 		"enrollment_id": null,
		 		"type_id": null,
		  		"service_id": null,
		  		"HMIS": null,
		  		"quantity": null,
		  		"comment": "",
		  		"row_num": len(instances)
				}
			#append to the list
			instances.append(object)
  			self.getChild("root").getChild("FlexRepeater").props.instances = instances
			#system.perspective.print(len(instances))
		#Reset the script trigger
		self.custom.func_add_service = False
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants CaseNotesDashboardEdit func_add_service")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

messageHandlers.script:
import traceback
	try:
		system.perspective.print('Remove Service')
		instances = self.props.instances
		returnInstances = []
		null = None
		RowNumber = 0
		for row in instances:
			#system.perspective.print(row)
			if int(row["row_num"]) != int(payload["row_num"]):
				object = {
					  "instanceStyle": {
					    "classes": ""
					  },
					  "instancePosition": {},
					  "participant_id": row["participant_id"],
					  "employee_id": row["employee_id"],
					  "enrollment_id": row["enrollment_id"],
					  "type_id": row["type_id"],
					  "service_id": row["service_id"],
					  "HMIS": row["HMIS"],
					  "quantity": row["quantity"],
					  "comment": row["comment"],
					  "row_num": RowNumber
					}
				RowNumber += 1	
				returnInstances.append(object)
			
		self.props.instances = returnInstances
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants CaseNotesDashboardEdit RemoveDashbaordService")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		#system.perspective.print("New Case Note Button Pressed")
		#Send the message to refresh the table
		messageType = 'refreshCaseNotesDashboard'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
		#Send a message to clear the search box
		messageType = 'ResetParticipantSearch'
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
		#Show the search box
		self.view.params.participant_search = True
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants CaseNotesDashboardEdit button_new")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		note_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.note_id
		time_created = system.date.now()
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
		if note_id > -1:
			participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
		else:
			participant_id = self.view.params.output_id
		employee_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.employee_id
		hmis = self.view.custom.edit_data.hmis
		note_type_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.note_type_id
		note = self.view.custom.edit_data.note

	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		valid = True
		if (note_id is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Note ID Error")
		elif (participant_id is None) or (int(participant_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Participant ID Error")
		elif (time_created is None):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Date Error")
		elif (employee_id is None) or (int(employee_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Employee ID Error")
		elif (note_type_id is None) or (int(note_type_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("Note Type ID Error")
		elif (hmis is None) or (int(hmis) < 0):
			valid = False
			system.perspective.print("HMIS Selection Error")
		elif True:
			for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.services)):
				service = self.view.custom.edit_data.services[row]
				if (service.employee_id) is None or (int(service.employee_id) < 0):
					valid = False
					system.perspective.print("Service Employee ID Error")
				elif (service.enrollment_id) is None or (int(service.enrollment_id) < 0):
					valid = False
					system.perspective.print("Service Enrollemnt ID Error")
				elif (service.service_id) is None or (int(service.service_id) < 0):
					valid = False
					system.perspective.print("Service ID Error")
				elif (service.HMIS is None) or (int(service.HMIS) < 0):
					valid = False
					system.perspective.print("Service HMIS Selection Error")
		elif valid == True:
			system.perspective.print("Case Notes Dashboard Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if note_id == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Insert New Data")
				path = "Participants/CaseNotes/CaseNotesDetailInsert"
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,
							"participant_id":participant_id,
							"employee_id":employee_id, 
							"hmis":hmis,"note_type_id":note_type_id,
							"note":note}
				note_row = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert Note")
				#system.perspective.print(note_row)
				#Insert the services
				if len(self.view.custom.edit_data.services):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.services)):
						service = self.view.custom.edit_data.services[row]
						employee_id = service.employee_id
						enrollment_id = service.enrollment_id
						service_id = service.service_id
						service_HMIS = service.HMIS
						quantity = service.quantity
						comment = service.comment
						path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailInsert"
						parameters = {"employee_id":employee_id, "enrollment_id":enrollment_id,
									"service_id":service_id, "participant_id":participant_id,
									"time_created":time_created,"user_name":user_name,
									"HMIS":service_HMIS,"quantity":quantity,
									"comment":comment}
						service_row = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
						#system.perspective.print("Insert Service")
						#system.perspective.print(service_row)
						#Link the Note and Services together
						path = "Participants/CaseNotes/CaseNoteServiceDetailInsert"
						parameters = {"case_note_id":note_row, "service_id":service_row,
									"time_created":time_created}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				else:
					Refresh = True
												
			
			
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data
			elif note_id >= 0:#Update existing data on specified row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Update Exisiting Data")
				system.perspective.print(employee_id)
				path = "Participants/CaseNotes/CaseNotesDetailUpdate"
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created,
							"participant_id":participant_id,
							"employee_id":employee_id, 
							"hmis":hmis,"note_type_id":note_type_id,
							"note":note,
							"row_id":note_id}
				nothing = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#system.perspective.print("Insert Note")
				#system.perspective.print(note_id)
				#Query and delete all services linked to the case note
				path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailNoteServiceSelect"
				parameters = {"note_id":note_id}
				service_list = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
				#system.perspective.print(service_list.getRowCount())
				if service_list.getRowCount():
					for service in range(service_list.getRowCount()):
						service_id = service_list.getValueAt(service,'ServicesId')
						#Delete the links to the Case Notes
						#system.perspective.print('Delete Case Note Link')
						path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailCaseNoteDelete"
						parameters = {"note_id":note_id,"service_id":service_id}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
						#Delete the data for the Services
						path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDelete"
						parameters = {"row_id":service_id}
						#system.perspective.print('Delete Service: ' + str(service))
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
				#Insert the services
				if len(self.view.custom.edit_data.services):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.services)):
						service = self.view.custom.edit_data.services[row]
						employee_id = service.employee_id
						enrollment_id = service.enrollment_id
						service_id = service.service_id
						service_HMIS = service.HMIS
						quantity = service.quantity
						comment = service.comment
						path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailInsert"
						parameters = {"employee_id":employee_id, "enrollment_id":enrollment_id,
									"service_id":service_id, "participant_id":participant_id,
									"time_created":time_created,"user_name":user_name,
									"HMIS":service_HMIS,"quantity":quantity,
									"comment":comment}
						service_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
						#system.perspective.print("Insert Service")
						#system.perspective.print(service_id)
						#system.perspective.print(note_id)
						#Link the Note and Services together
						path = "Participants/CaseNotes/CaseNoteServiceDetailInsert"
						parameters = {"case_note_id":note_id, "service_id":service_id,
									"time_created":time_created}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				else:
					Refresh = True	
			##### Refresh the table
			if Refresh:
				system.perspective.print("Case Notes Dashboard Query Success")
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshCaseNotesDashboardData", payload={}, scope="session")
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Case note updated.")	

		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.")
				
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Case Notes Dashboard")
	   	msg = traceback.format_exc()
	   	logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

### Declare parameters
	project = "RITI" 
	note_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.note_id
		
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (note_id is None) or (int(note_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Note ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Case Notes Dashboard Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		try:
			#Query and delete all services linked to the case note
			path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailNoteServiceSelect"
			parameters = {"note_id":note_id}
			service_list = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			#system.perspective.print(str(service_list.getRowCount()) + ' linked services found')
			if service_list.getRowCount():
				for service in range(service_list.getRowCount()):
					service_id = service_list.getValueAt(service,'ServicesId')
					#Delete the links to the Case Notes
					#system.perspective.print('Delete Case Note Link. Case Note:' + str(note_id) + ' Service:' + str(service_id))
					path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailCaseNoteDelete"
					parameters = {"note_id":note_id,"service_id":service_id}
					Refresh_link = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
					#Delete the data for the Services
					path = "Participants/Services/ServicesDetailDelete"
					parameters = {"row_id":service_id}
					#system.perspective.print('Delete Service: ' + str(service_id))
					Refresh_service = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
			#Delete the Case Note
			path = "Participants/CaseNotes/CaseNotesDetailDelete"
			parameters = {"row_id":note_id}
			#system.perspective.print('Delete Case Note: ' + str(note_id))
			Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		

			##### Refresh the table
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshCaseNotesDashboardData", payload={}, scope="session")
			
		except:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while deleting data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False
